title: Cheyenne Showdown
description: Something’s rotten in Cheyenne... Someone wants to be King...  ...Heads are going to roll.  In the wild west, a hundred years after throwing off the royal yoke, there are fortunes to be made and men bent on winning the power and prestige, of kings, if not the title. Thorn is not one of them. He wants Elly, and he wants his ranch.  When the greedy steal something precious from a friend, Thorn steps up to help. Unable to untangle the maze of paper, he falls back on what he knows – six-guns and iron fists.  Cheyenne Showdown is the third book in Wyatt Cochrane’s Marshall Family Western series. If you love the honest brave men in Louis L’Amour’s books and the cowboy romance in C.J.Petitt’s, then you’ll love a series that combines these timeless traits in a classic, fast-paced, western action adventure series.  Buy this book to continue the exciting adventure today!
author: Wyatt Cochrane
